questions.text: Which of the following is a key benefit of using NetSuite's unified business management suite?

answers.text: Real-time visibility across all business operations

questions.explanation: NetSuite provides real-time visibility across all business operations through its unified suite, allowing organizations to make informed decisions based on accurate, up-to-date information.

questions.text: Which of the following features are available in NetSuite? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: NetSuite includes Financial Management, CRM, and PSA as core functionalities within its unified business suite.
